kdl.prox.qgraph2
Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.qgraph2.Annotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Annotation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents a numeric annotation, either on a QGItem (QGVertex or QGEdge), or on an AbstractQuery.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

Annotation

public Annotation(int min,
                  int max)
Integer-based constructor. Throws IllegalArgumentException if invalid parameters - recall validity conditions:

Each numeric annotation is of the form [i..j], [i..], or [i], where i and j are whole numbers and i < j.

Annotation

public Annotation(org.jdom.Element annotationElement)
Full-arg constructor. Throws IllegalArgumentException if annotationElement is invalid - recall validity conditions:

Each numeric annotation is of the form [i..j], [i..], or [i], where i and j are whole numbers and i < j.
